CODE_DESCRIPTION: The code uses p5.js to generate a static image composed of multiple vertical deformed lines. Each line is formed by a sequence of vertices whose positions, fill, and stroke weight are modulated by a sinusoidal function of x and y. The function f(x, y) combines sine and cosine components to create angle-based distortions.
GENERATION_METHOD: Mathematical transformation using sine and cosine functions over a grid
OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION: A static canvas filled with warped vertical lines in blue tones on a black background, with stroke weight and vertex displacement driven by trigonometric calculations.
